description: Soleil`s Eevee evolved into Soleil`s Umbreon one day when she was younger. When she was scared by a Crobat, her Eevee protected her. It evolved at night the same day that her Soleil`s Espeon had evolved. During the group battle at the Eclipse Castle balcony, it helped defeat Ilunas`s Pok√©mon.
name: Blacky (Haruhi)
